page.title: 09FARM AND WOODLAND NEAR M2
page.content: {Houses: Half of old Ringshill House was built in 1920 and completed in 1963.It has been inhabited for roughly 20 years.The nearest shop was 1\ miles away and the nearest public telephone was in the village.Greylands cottage, built one hundred and eight years ago, was owned by a solicitor who moved to South America. {Nursing home :Next door is Rosehaven nursing home,owned by a matron,who with her husband,fixed a damaged roof when they moved in.Inside the big house,the matron is registered to nurse ten elderly people.A lift has been built for their use.The matron has a private telephone,as the nearest public services are in Borstal,one mile away.The elderly people have their own telephone.
